page.title: 03REW STREET NEAR GURNARD.
page.content: On the west side of the marsh is Rew Street.It is a long road with houses and farms.There is a pond in Rew Street and the farmer has put some ducks on the pond and made a nesting box and put it in the middle of the pond.There are rats by the pond, I think they are eating the duck food. When we find frogs we put them in the pond and this year the pond was black with tadpoles. Rew Street still has three gas street lights.One outside Baskett's farm,the second outside Sunny Cot caravan site and the third on Hillis Corner. There were four(one opposite Hart's farm) but that was replaced by an electric light because the old one had rusted away.
